alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 8:01PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau For the Bayou Des Cannes...including Eunice...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 815 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique near Basile. * WHEN...From late Friday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Moderate flood threat downstream including a few residences near jennings, mermentau, and silverwood. Operations at silverwood shipyard could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning and continue rising to a crest of 24.0 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
